title: Workshop on Graphic-Based EML (Educational Modeling Language) Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical training using graphic tools to enable learners in managerial/leadership roles to efficiently design language education content

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least one learning design using graphic tools based on the IMS LD standard.
Learners can propose two or more reusable content structures by modifying existing learning designs.
Learners can analyze dependencies between learning design elements to create an optimal activity sequence.

resources: IMS LD-compatible graphic authoring tool accounts

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
